SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class QRCodeScannerTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.QRCodeScannerTest
public class QRCodeScannerTest extends Object
Unit tests for US 01.06.01: As an entrant I want to view event details within the app by scanning the promotional QR code. These tests validate that:
  • QR code deep links are generated in the correct format
  • Deep link format validation works correctly (scheme and host)
  • Event ID extraction from deep link strings works correctly
  • Invalid QR code formats are detected
  • Empty and null QR code data is handled

Note: URI parsing using Android's Uri class requires Android runtime and is tested in instrumented tests. These unit tests focus on string-based validation and deep link generation logic.

  • Method Details

    • extractEventIdFromDeepLink

      private String extractEventIdFromDeepLink(String deepLink)
      Helper method to extract event ID from a deep link string. This simulates the logic used in QRCodeScannerFragment.
      Parameters:
      deepLink - the deep link string (e.g., "chicksevent://event/E123")
      Returns:
      the event ID, or null if invalid

    • isValidDeepLinkFormat

      private boolean isValidDeepLinkFormat(String deepLink)
      Helper method to validate deep link format. This simulates the validation logic used in QRCodeScannerFragment.
      Parameters:
      deepLink - the deep link string to validate
      Returns:
      true if the deep link has correct format, false otherwise

    • entrant_qrCodeDeepLink_hasCorrectFormat

      public void entrant_qrCodeDeepLink_hasCorrectFormat()
      Test Case 1: QR code deep link is generated in correct format. As an entrant, when I scan a QR code, it should contain a deep link in the format: chicksevent://event/{eventId}

    • entrant_qrCodeDeepLink_containsEventId

      public void entrant_qrCodeDeepLink_containsEventId()
      Test Case 2: QR code deep link contains event ID. As an entrant, the QR code deep link should contain the event ID that can be extracted to view event details.

    • entrant_differentEvents_generateDifferentDeepLinks

      public void entrant_differentEvents_generateDifferentDeepLinks()
      Test Case 3: Different events generate different deep links. As an entrant, each event should have a unique deep link that corresponds to that specific event.
